name: RoboDom Browser Version
description:
Link to downloadable project: https://thesoupmasta.itch.io/robodom

Controls to the 1v1 gamemode:

Esc Key - Exit to main menu

Player 1 (Starts on the left side):
W - Jump
A  - Move left
D - Move right
Space Bar - Shoot

Player 2 (Starts on the right side):
Up Arrow Key - Jump
Left Arrow Key - Move left
Right Arrow Key - Move right
Down Arrow Key - Shoot

Keep in mind that touching the traps will kill you!



Controls to the Storymode:
Controls:
W - Jump
A  - Move left
D - Move right
Space Bar - Shoot
Esc Key - Exit to main menu

Traps will reset the level. The light gray words are the creator and the black words are you character's. 

Keep in mind pressing the Quit button while in browser play will crash the program.
